QuestParts.Response2: That's fine, I'm not here for that.
QuestParts.Response1: Actually, I'm here to ask you a few questions.
QuestParts.Response3: Cut the crap holy man, the first Demon was spotted here, I want answers now, and you better not make me kill another Fox!
QuestParts.GiverText: Back so soon? I'm sorry I having nothing more for you to do my child.
QuestParts.ObjectiveText: Question Jesus about the Demon sightings near the Church.

QuestParts.GiverText: Questions? For me?
QuestParts.Response2: We received reports that the first Demon was sighted near the Church, can you tell us anything about that?
QuestParts.Response1: Yes, now are you going to cooperate?

QuestParts.GiverText: So what have you come here for?
QuestParts.Response2: What did the Fox have to do with the Demon invasion?
QuestParts.Response1: I've come to investigate reports that the Demons were first spotted here.

QuestParts.GiverText: Well then if that's how you're going to treat the savior of all mankind then I can't see why I should answer your question.
QuestParts.Response2: How about you comply with the Law here Mr. Holiness?
QuestParts.Response1: ... I'm sorry you're holiness.
QuestParts.Response3: I'm about 3 seconds away from blowing your head off and finding out for myself.

QuestParts.GiverText: Well then ask away Officer.
QuestParts.Response2: Who are you?
QuestParts.Response1: The first Demon was spotted near here, do you know anything about that?

QuestParts.GiverText: I believe he was the instigator, I saw him lead other Demons into the Forest and up North to the Village, slaying him was a great deed.
QuestParts.Response2: Hmm, he didn't seem like a Hell Fox
QuestParts.Response1: Interesting, so the Fox was not of this world?

QuestParts.GiverText: Apology accepted Officer, now what were those questions you had?
QuestParts.ObjectiveText: Explore the area near the Church to discover the source of the Demon invasion.
QuestParts.Response2: Actually no, I'm not gonna take this.
QuestParts.Response1: Yes, of course, let's get back to those.

QuestParts.GiverText: How about you comply with my Holiness Mr. Law?
QuestParts.ObjectiveText: Explore the area near the Church to discover the source of the Demon invasion.
QuestParts.Response2: Fine. I have some questions to ask you.
QuestParts.Response1: How about you see how well your Holiness can take a stab wound to the gut?

QuestParts.GiverText: Well then if that's how it's going to be then I'm not going to answer your questions.
QuestParts.ObjectiveText: Explore the area near the Church to discover the source of the Demon invasion.
QuestParts.Response2: Wait, I'm sorry, answer my questions and I'll leave you alone.
QuestParts.Response1: Fine. Goodbye.

QuestParts.GiverText: Yes, I did spot a Demon over to the East by the Cave.
QuestParts.ObjectiveText: Explore the cave east of the Church to discover the source of the Demon invasion.
QuestParts.Response2: How long ago was that?
QuestParts.Response1: Were they coming from the Cave?
QuestParts.Response3: Did they kill all the people in the Church here?

QuestParts.GiverText: I am Jesus.
QuestParts.Response2: But who are you really?
QuestParts.Response1: I don't remember any passages in the Bible detailing Jesus' hatred of Foxes.
QuestParts.Response3: Alright then, the first Demon was spotted near here, do you have anything to say about that?

QuestParts.GiverText: My child, the Bible is full of mysteries, if you knew all of my intentions there wouldn't be much of a point to being mysterious would there?
QuestParts.Response2: Sounds like an excuse to me.
QuestParts.Response1: I see. Well I have other questions for you.

QuestParts.GiverText: I am the wind in the valleys, the snow on the mountain tops, the birds in the treetops. I am the one who created both the living and the dead, I am-
QuestParts.ObjectiveText: Explore the area near the Church to discover the source of the Demon invasion.
QuestParts.Response2: On to my next questions.
QuestParts.Response1: Alright, alright I get it. Jesus.

QuestParts.GiverText: Call it whatever you like my child, it's all you're going to get out of me.
QuestParts.Response2: You're starting to sound like a hostile witness.
QuestParts.Response1: Well then, I have more questions for you.
QuestParts.Response3: I killed a Fox for you man! Answer my questions!

QuestParts.GiverText: I am simply answering your questions to the best of my ability Officer.
QuestParts.ObjectiveText: Explore the area near the Church to discover the source of the Demon invasion.
QuestParts.Response2: We're done here.
QuestParts.Response1: Very well, I have more questions for you.

QuestParts.GiverText: No.
QuestParts.ObjectiveText: Explore the area near the Church to discover the source of the Demon invasion.
QuestParts.Response1: We're done here.

QuestParts.GiverText: Yes?
QuestParts.Response1: On to my next set of questions.

QuestParts.GiverText: I could not tell, but their were swarms of them surrounding the cave, didn't you have to fight past them to get here?
QuestParts.ObjectiveText: Explore the Cave east of the Church to discover the source of the Demon invasion.
QuestParts.Response2: I did, let me ask you a few more questions.
QuestParts.Response1: I did, thank you I think I can take it from here.

QuestParts.GiverText: They attacked not but an hour ago, curiously they stayed away from the Church, so I remained here inside these walls.
QuestParts.ObjectiveText: Explore the Cave east of the Church to discover the source of the Demon invasion.
QuestParts.Response2: Yes, curious. Can I ask you something?
QuestParts.Response1: That was smart, I have a few more questions.
QuestParts.Response3: That's good to know, thank you I think I've got all that I need.

QuestParts.GiverText: The others from the Church fleed, and the Demons felled them all, there were no survivors.
QuestParts.ObjectiveText: Explore the Cave east of the Church to discover the source of the Demon invasion.
QuestParts.Response2: Damn, we're too late. Thank you, I think that's enough information. I'll avenge those people.
QuestParts.Response1: I see, and you alone were left alive?

QuestParts.GiverText: Yes, almost certainly, it was a spawn of Satan, now don't you have more questions for me or are you just going to keep asking me about this Fox?
QuestParts.Response2: I think I may have a few more questions about the Fox.
QuestParts.Response1: That's all I need to know about the Fox.

QuestParts.GiverText: Well he was, now what other questions did you have for me?
QuestParts.Response2: I want to know more about his Fox.
QuestParts.Response1: Yes of course, let's get to those.

QuestParts.GiverText: I've told you everything there is to know about the Fox! Now, let's move on shall we?
QuestParts.Response2: You're starting to sound like a hostile witness.
QuestParts.Response1: Sure, let's.

QuestParts.GiverText: You are forgiven my child.
QuestParts.Response1: Thank you my LORD, now for my questions.

QuestParts.GiverText: Kneel before the LORD, and I shall forgive you.
QuestParts.ObjectiveText: Explore the area near the Church to discover the source of the Demon invasion.
QuestParts.Response2: Whatever, I'm done with you. I'll find my own way.
QuestParts.Response1: *Kneel for the LORD*

QuestParts.GiverText: No.
QuestParts.ObjectiveText: Explore the area near the Church to discover the source of the Demon invasion.
QuestParts.Response2: Please?
QuestParts.Response1: Fine.
